QuestData.Title: Deathwing's Fall
QuestData.Description: The Twilight's Hammer involvement in the disappearance of the World Pillar fragment makes complete sense. Let us hope that we can act swiftly enough to recover it.$B$B<Maruut places his hand on your shoulder.>$B$BI've established a spiritual bond with you. We should be able to communicate while you remain in Deepholm.$B$BGo to Deathwing's Fall to the southeast and investigate the Twilight's Hammer operation there.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Our spirits are now linked so that we may communicate while you're away.
QuestData.PortraitTurnInText: They must've brought the fragment here!
QuestData.LogDescription: Go to Deathwing's Fall in Deepholm.
QuestData.RewardText: This must be where the world pillar fragment was brought. Let's have a closer look.
